title: Terms of Use
intro: By using this website, you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree, please do not use this site.

sections.heading: Website Use
sections.body: Information on this site is provided for general educational purposes and does not replace professional medical advice.

sections.heading: Appointments and Services
sections.body: Submitting a request does not guarantee an appointment. We will confirm availability directly with you.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.body: All content, design, and materials on this site are owned by Dr Huang Clinic unless otherwise stated.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.body: We are not responsible for any damages resulting from the use of this website or reliance on its content.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.body: We may update these terms periodically. The latest version will always be available on this page.
